attributes.action: Charge for medical assistance for binge drinking week-ends
attributes.additional_details: to stop free medical assitance for binge drinking incidents at week-ends and introduce a fix charge. Drunken and disorderly should be charged for assistance.  It is no longer affordable for the NHS to waste money on people that at week-end have nothing better to do rather than get drunk and be an hindrance on society.  Moneys should be spent to assist the ill and the needing

rejection.details: This issue is covered in the petition titled "NHS should not be free to all"
